normalized: an air of crisis filled the inside of the demons' arena.
the audience, which had become panicked, rushed for the exits, scrambling to be first.

name: guard 1
normalized: shit!
make an announcement and try to calm them down!

name: guard 2
normalized: it's impossible!
if we don't do something about this uproar first…

name: guard 1
normalized: in that case, seize those two!
the guards, who had come to their senses quickly in this situation, got in the arena and tried to arrest asagi and asuka.

name: black
normalized: don't get in the way.

name: guard 1
normalized: eh…?
an unsuitably calm voice was suddenly heard at that point.
instantly, several of the guards who had gotten onto the arena had their fields of vision cut in half, became lumps of meat, and collapsed.

name: guard 3
normalized: b, black-sama?

name: black
normalized: cease your boorish behaviour.

name: guard 3
normalized: abehh!
panic spread even further through the audience at the sight of blades of darkness, which stretched from black, cutting the guards to pieces.

name: black
normalized: now, the obstacles have been dealt with, asagi.

name: asagi
normalized: kuh.
feelings of pressure and suffocation, entirely like she had been swallowed by an enormous animal's stomach.

name: black
normalized: asagi, i can see the despair inside you.
black, who was the source of that, smiled wickedly as he gazed at asagi.

name: black
normalized: slightly excited hope is the greatest spice for despair.
black stared at asagi, while making an expression like he was enjoying a first-rate wine.
no, the next moment, his figure turned into a black mist, faded, and disappeared.

name: asagi
normalized: asuka!
asagi sharply gave off a warning.
but asuka had reacted before that.
dodging the blades of darkness from black, who had appeared in her blind spot, with a flowing movement,

name: asuka
normalized: hahh!
she brandished her anti-demon blades.
black's right arm was sliced off and sent flying.

name: black
normalized: fufu, you never change, do you?
black said merrily.
the arm that had dropped off turned to mist, and was rapidly reconstituting.

name: asuka
normalized: how about you stop being pretentious, and turn into your true form right away?

name: asagi
normalized: true form…?

name: black
normalized: very well.
now, i will show you my true form once more.

name: black
normalized: asagi, this is the first time for you, isn't it?
you'll be surprised… and then give up hope!
black's shouki expanded.
so much that it covered the whole demons' arena.
the spectators were collapsing.

name: asagi
normalized: wha?!

name: asuka
normalized: asagi-san, here it comes!
black's body started wavering.
it was changing appearance.
no, everything that composed his body was about to return to the form it should have had naturally.

name: black
normalized: tearing off your limbs, i shall welcome you to the family of darkness, asagii!
出現したのは、第三の目をもつ四臂の魔人。
４本の腕にはそれぞれ、異なる武器を持ち、その全てがアスカとアサギに向けられている。

name: black
normalized: now, shall we enjoy ourselves?
overwhelming pressure.
however, the pair didn't show signs of retreating even one bit.

name: asagi
normalized: mad king of the undead!
my fangs will reach you today.
for the sake of her mission.

name: asuka
normalized: enemy of my family, enemy of oboro-san, i will kill you, and make you suffer a lot.
for the sake of burying the past, and grabbing hold of the future.

name: black
normalized: hmph, do you want to experience despair so quickly?

name: asuka
normalized: asagi-san!
he sucks up the energy of attacks with a gravitational barrier.

name: asagi
normalized: gravitational barrier?

name: asuka
normalized: your attack won't get through by doing it normally.
even my “speed” was taken away.

name: asagi
normalized: is there a way to destroy it?

name: asuka
normalized: there isn't one so far.

name: asagi
normalized: so we're going to wing it?

name: asuka
normalized: with all our might!
asuka nodded vigorously to asagi, who smiled daringly.
even if they had no way to bring him down, they should be able to find one now.
even though they were no match for him alone, together…
strong determination for success sustained the pair.

name: black
normalized: idiots.
he lightly snorted at asagi and asuka, who focused on him, and at that moment, his large body turned into mist.

name: asagi
normalized: here he comes!

name: asuka
normalized: yeah!
the pair extended their consciousnesses to their surroundings as they stood ready.
however――

name: black
normalized: your reaction is slower than last time, little girl.

name: asuka
normalized: kuuh!
suddenly, without any warning, black appeared behind asuka.

name: black
normalized: haa!

name: asagi
normalized: asuka!
asagi parried the demonic sickle, which had been swung down towards asuka, at the last moment.
however, it wouldn't stop.

name: asagi
normalized: kuh!
asagi's posture wavered slightly due to the pure brute force being unleashed by the huge body.

name: asuka
normalized: haah!
in order to compensate for that weak point, asuka soared.
like that, she landed behind black, and attacked with her anti-demon blades.

name: asuka
normalized: ＜android leg＞ “spiral kick”!

name: black
normalized: too slow!
black's demonic sword flicked off asuka's whirlwind kick.

name: asuka
normalized: tchh!
it was faster than last time.
and more powerful.
the instant asagi slightly faltered, black's figure disappeared again.

name: asuka
normalized: where did he…?!
an opponent whose place of emergence could not be determined.
asuka, who had judged so, moved around with light steps.
but the next moment, the area under her feet darkened.

name: asuka
normalized: above?!
an attack from an unexpected direction.
she looked up, and there was black, prepared to use his scythe.

name: black
normalized: over already, girl?!

name: asuka
normalized: kuuh!
she stiffened her body reflexively.

name: asagi
normalized: no, not yet!
instantly, asagi's voice reverberated, and the noise of her lightly kicking off the ground resounded at the same time.

name: asagi
normalized: haa!
asagi, who had reorganized her posture, had rushed toward black, who was in midair.

name: black
normalized: tsk!
black slightly contorted his expression due to asagi's surprise attack.
but that was for a moment.

name: black
normalized: haa!
without warning, he counterattacked with all four limbs.

name: asagi
normalized: kuuh!
there was already a disparity in physique.
what would happen if his physical strength, which was impossible for a human, was added to that…?

name: asagi
normalized: aguh!
the next moment, learning black's physical strength firsthand, asagi was blown away.

name: black
normalized: something like that, asagii?!

name: asuka
normalized: there's still more to come!
the instant black concentrated on asagi, asuka's voice echoed throughout the arena.
she pushed her android arms out forward.
along with a thunderous electrical charging sound, a vortex was concentrated at the point at which the android arms extended.
a bluish-white flash was directed towards black.

name: asuka
normalized: ＜android arm＞, certain kiill!

name: asuka
normalized: anti-demon super-particle guunn!
with that deadly keyword, asuka released a surge of taima.
the energy that had converged and condensed was fired towards black.
overwhelming energy drew near him.

name: black
normalized: futile futile futiile!
but it was futile.
black, who had reacted quickly to asuka's attack, extended his powerful gravitational barrier in front of it, and suppressed it completely.

name: asuka
normalized: even that's no use?!
amazement toward the fact that the attack she placed absolute faith in had been defended against.
in other words, a moment of weakness.

name: black
normalized: haa!
black wasn't about to miss that unmistakable opening.
black fired a beam of concentrated dark power from his fingertip.

name: asuka
normalized: crap!
half a second later, asuka twisted her body and avoided the beam that was going to shoot through her.
however, that was a new opening.
the figure of black, who had fired the light beam half a second before, completely disappeared from asuka's field of vision.

name: asuka
normalized: kuh, again!

name: black
normalized: diiee!
his howl resounded for a moment.

name: asuka
normalized: haguu!
the four weapons that were held in black's hands.
the trajectories and overwhelming power of all of them converged, focused on asuka!

name: asuka
normalized: agih!
unable to withstand the load put on them, asuka's limbs blew apart.
the agony of all feeling being severed instantaneously.
perhaps due to the power of the demonic weapons, pain that exceeded the pain inhibitors of her android legs assailed her.

name: asuka
normalized: guhaa!
asuka opened her eyes wide from the pain, which was so intense that she would go mad if she were a normal person.

name: black
normalized: diiee!
black fired off even more attacks at asuka, who had completely lost her mobility.
that instant.

name: asagi
normalized: i won't let you!
asagi obstructed the trajectories of the four weapons held in black's four arms.

name: black
normalized: unh!
all of the attacks fired towards asuka were defended against, and black's expression slightly distorted.

name: asagi
normalized: ninja art “light battle blossom”
in the brief space of time which that had yielded, asagi unleashed her ability.

name: asagi
normalized: “hundred-strike slash”!
an attack that literally condensed the power of a hundred strikes into one blow.
with speed that even the sounds of the destruction trailed after, asagi shattered all of black's weapons.
however, asagi's attacks did not stop with that.

name: asagi
normalized: more!
certain death.
asagi's attacks would not stop until they reached that.
accelerating to a velocity that easily surpassed the speed of a god, she thrust her sword into black.
how, ever.

name: black
normalized: naive, weak, slooww!

name: asagi
normalized: wha?!
black was even further ahead of asagi's attacks, which even sound lagged behind.
the attack had lost its effect―in other words, she swung and missed.

name: asagi
normalized: dammit!
black's arms extended towards her.

name: asagi
normalized: agah!
her skin was split open, her flesh turned inside-out, and her ribs pulverized.
what came after that was the feeling of her heart literally being grabbed hold of.

name: asagi
normalized: agi!
ah, gagigaah!
holding onto the organ that was the basis of her life, he lifted her up.
not only that.
black's hand, which had pierced through asagi's chest, began to assimilate with her.

name: black
normalized: now, it's time to wake up, asagi.
i shall drag out your soul, which lies dormant in the mother sea.

name: asagi
normalized: giih!
hiaah!
the agony of not just her body, but even her mind being eaten away.
good to evil, morality to corruption, she turned inside-out without pause.
without any bleeding―or, rather, with her flesh and blood becoming completely connected with black―the assimilation accelerated.

name: asagi
normalized: agyah!
oguii!
even the screams of agony that she raised involuntarily turned into voices of joy.
her soul was being contaminated.
she was going to turn into something other than herself.
perverse joy from that.

name: black
normalized: you will become one with me, asagi.
resistance is useless.
you cannot oppose me now.
immediately after, a little black vortex was generated in the space between black and asagi.

name: asagi
normalized: uh, gih!
wh, what is this?!

name: black
normalized: you'll find out right away.
a black vortex.
asagi's body screeched from that vortex, which seemed to be sucking not just her body, but even her soul into it.

name: black
normalized: the world of humans and the world of demons are nothing more than drops of water floating in our mother sea.
their destruction has been destined since the two drops united.

name: asagi
normalized: s, toh… stop…!

name: black
normalized: do you understand, asagi?
you and i are the gravitational force about to unify those two drops.

name: black
normalized: drawn by even greater gravitational force, the unified drop will soon trickle down into the mother sea, and burst.

name: black
normalized: the world will be dispersed, and created.
in this situation, black's voice permeated and echoed harshly in her mind.
that alone was proof that the corrosion was progressing.

name: asagi
normalized: stoh…hp!
don't go inside… me!
no matter how much she tried to refuse, it was futile.
it felt exactly like being caught in a bog and pulled in.
black ripples drew in her whole body, and turned it inside-out.

name: asagi
normalized: hi, gifuu!
agahiah♪
even her anguished noises turned into moans of ecstasy.
in accordance with that phenomenon, the black vortex that had arisen between asagi and black, which one could even call a black hole, became larger.

name: black
normalized: now, the purification begins.
i wonder if you know what's about to happen after this?
its effect was transmitted to her not through his words, but through instinct.

name: black
normalized: the unified and dispersed drops will each become a new world!

name: black
normalized: in those worlds, you and i will be immortalized as gods for all eternity!
black's voice became excited from the joy of creating that existence.
however…

name: asagi
normalized: does the tedious speech… end there?
suddenly, a voice of contempt was heard.

name: black
normalized: whaat?!
black's face made a look of surprise at asagi, who had expressed a bold smile in this situation.

name: asagi
normalized: you'd best not pick a fight with a kunoichi lightly.
that moment, asagi made a snap of the wrist.

name: black
normalized: gah!
right after that, a third of black's vision―no, more than that― disappeared.
a kunai bearing anti-demon power, which asagi had fired, had pierced through his third eye.

name: asagi
normalized: you and i are about to fall down into the depths of the gravitational force together.
your barrier doesn't work on me now!

name: black
normalized: yoouu biitch!
a roar of anger toward having been dragged down from the peak of what he believed was absolute victory.
asagi ignored that as she turned her attention and her gaze away from black.

name: asagi
normalized: asuka!
the distortion that black and asagi, two sources of gravitational force, had created.
a chance of winning the size of the eye of a needle.
asuka would fire all she could into there!

name: asuka
normalized: this time for sure!
take this!
＜android arm＞ certain kiill!
at that moment, a commanding roar resounded.
asuka, whose android legs had been destroyed, proclaimed the deadly keywords!
enveloped in flashes, a strong wind surged around her overloaded android arms.
she was dealing with so much pain, so much of a load, that not just her steel arms, but her entire body would blow apart.
but she didn't care.

name: asuka
normalized: with this blooww!
she put everything into it!
this moment, only that made sense!

name: asuka
normalized: anti-demon super-particle guunn!

name: asuka
normalized: maximum buurst!
unable to bear the overload, her android arms began crumbling from the bases, but she didn't stop!
she had lost her arms.
however, the intent to grasp something travelled along her arms, and converged in her fingertips.

name: asuka
normalized: goo!
the soulful howl―which circulated even through her electronics―and the will of asuka were fired toward black!

name: black
normalized: absuurrd!
enveloped by that flash, black raised a scream of death agony.
but it didn't end with that alone.

name: asagi
normalized: haa!
with all her strength, asagi cut off the head of black, whose body had been pierced by the extremely thick, circular beam that asuka gave off.

name: asagi
normalized: it's over…
feelings of desolation showed through on the face of asagi, who had declared so.
rather than satisfaction that it was over, asagi's heart was filled with sorrow for what she had lost before this.
however, as she watched black's body dispersing, there were words that came out.
they were words that only the person who had led to this outcome had the right to say.
thus, on behalf of the people who had fallen victim to him before now, asagi spoke those words.

name: asagi
normalized: farewell, edwin black.
